name: Emma at the Farm
description:
Join Emma, and her dog Pickles, as she spends the day at Uncle Jules' farm. However, everything quickly turns into an uproar as the chicks have gone missing, the piglets have run away, the eggs must be collected, the cows must be milked, along with all of the other chores. Only you can help Emma put things right again!

  • Animals - take care of the farm animals; Neddy the donkey, the rabbits, the piglets, the sheep, the hens, and more
  • Learning - Discover lots of fun things: the vegetables in the garden, the sounds of the animals and delicious recipes
  • Fashion - dress Emma in any clothes you like from the vast wardrobe available to you
  • Cooking - learn many new recipes
  • Exclusive sticker sheet included- perfect for decorating your Nintendo DS!
  • 18 mini-games use the Nintendo DS functionality - blow on your screen to make the dandelion clocks fly away, call Neddy the donkey, use the stylus to look for eggs and more
